About.Name: David Lee
About.Currently: Electrical Engineering Student with a background in Biology
About.AboutText:
Hello, I am David Lee. I am a passionate electrical engineering student with a keen interest in biotech and biomed engineering. Currently, I am pursuing my undergraduate degree at Seattle Pacific University. I am dedicated to expanding my knowledge and skills in various areas of electrical engineering and biology, with a particular focus on biomechanics and robotics.

I enjoy tackling challenging programming projects and I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute my expertise and learn from my peers.

Beyond the classroom, I actively engage in extracurricular activities related to computer science, including hackathons, coding competitions, and open-source contributions. I believe in the importance of continuous learning and seek out opportunities to explore new technologies and methodologies.
